title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made, beautiful, and appreciate its lovely color. The wool material is soft, with one customer noting it feels like 100% cashmere, and they find it warm. While some it's not scratchy or itchy, others find it uncomfortable against the skin. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some saying it's perfect while others find it runs small, and opinions on sizing are divided between accurate

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good quality
items.body: Beautiful color and fit perfectly. I wanted a warmer seater for cold weather and for travel. Perfect weight for layering too. Read more
items.author: Penny Carey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely turtleneck sweaters, highly recommend!
items.body: Lovely wool thick sweaters! Haven’t washed them yet but they look so good under a dress. I Live in Vermont, and we get cold weather 6 months of the year. So I Love Wool. I know how to wash it: turn inside out, get wool laundry soap, use borax if you have hard water, I start the wash with warm water, rinse cold water. Gentle wash only, I hang my laundry so wool benefits from no dryer, no fabric softener. Try to use no scents in your laundry soap. If you own wool buy wool laundry soap. Read more
items.author: Sarah Hillier

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size up, but cute and soft
items.body: Some people complained it was scratchy, and I could see that but it’s really not that bad. I actually think the material is quite soft, just need to make sure I’m moisturized before wearing! I love this top, I did order a size up because I saw a few reviews saying to do so, and I’m glad I did. I like it Read more
items.author: Jean Thompson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've Worn This Sweater Often and Love it
items.body: I love the turtleneck sweater alone or layered with another sweater. It stands the test of time as I notice no pilling, I wear it with so many of my bottoms, denim or trousers. It also pairs with my plaid pencil skirt as well! A mighty staple to own, and at an attainable price too. I notice no threads or missed stitching. Black is the versatile color to choose, and I feel great about this purchase. I will wear it for years to come weather permitting Read more
items.author: Enchantress6274

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad quality….
items.body: Was looking and hoping for a warm sweater that doesn’t have to clean the lint like the cheap cashmere ones. The sweater looked elegant when I opened it . It is warm but after one wear, I wore it for 4 hours(didn’t have the chance to wash yet) it looks like I have it for at least a year! I need to clean the lint now and the sweater looks like old and warn off. Bad quality I guess and I won’t be able to return cause my window has closed. Very disappointed… Read more
items.author: ET

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Sweaters and Seller
items.body: I've purchased many sweaters in two different styles from ChanYarn and have never had any issues with the sweaters or company. The sweaters are 100% wool, which is thick, soft, and not scratchy or itchy. The size chart is correct. I normally wear a size large (5'8" 140#) and purchased a large the fit is perfect. I have them dry cleaned and haven't ever washed them myself so I can't comment on it. Read more
items.author: R. S.

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stench
items.body: Sweater smells so bad when I bought it . Nice Sweater but the stench was horrible. I recorded u buy something else . Read more
items.author: MaryJane

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Lovely but fits small
items.body: Lovely sweater, well made and soft but poorly sized. You need to order at least one size up from normal. Read more
items.author: SusanD

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Blue, Black, Light Yellow, Red, Khaki, Pink, Beige, Star Blue, Light Purple, Caramel, Green, Grey, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
